sub_title: General Manager / Owner at Taurus Management b.v.
summary:
Work areas / branches:

• Commercial management BA / consultancy SME / international markets
• International fashion / ready-to-wear (retail / wholesale, 'entrepreneur') B2B / B2C, production / styling private label collections
• Commercial management / consultancy for fashion on international markets, retail / wholesale, franchise / concessions / s-i-s, business-/ export development. Specialization: roll-out / start export German market and German-speaking countries (DACH). Consulting on location policy / real estate 
•Development / acquisition / export-/ key account management 
• Marcom- / PR activities (strategy / conception / implementation / c.i. / profiling / positioning / branding, corporate fashion, housestyle management                                        
• Journalism (newspapers / fashion trade press, publishing, corporate communication / newsletters, translations, copywriting 

Knowledge / understanding:
• International fashion / ready-to-wear / FMCG (retail / wholesale / production / sales / marketing / consultancy /  styling, retail development and management   
• Profound working experience in international business, especially Germany / German-speaking countries but also other European markets   	
• Broad experience on marketing-/ communication projects (interim / free agent)
• Project-based and interim assignments	 
• Business-/ divison management 
• Staff coaching and motivation;
• Trend watching 
• NGO / charity / fundraising (sustainability, environment
• Experienced in editing / publishing (corporate) magazines, organization of press conferences / events 

Personal qualifications / skills: 	
Entrepreneur, internationally experienced, goal-orientated, creative, flexible, persevering. Pragmatic, analytical. Strong interpersonal, networking skills, excellent communicator, capable of developing productive relationships, representative. Mother tongue Dutch, fluent in German / English, good knowledge of French and basic knowledge of Italian.

profile_positions.description:
Consultancy in matters of general management, export/new business SME's, marcom / branding. FMCG / lifestyle. Core business: acquisition, business development. Specialsm DACH markets. Experienced with project management and assignments. Consultancy startup retail / s-i-s, Strategic campagnes and branding. Extensive networks. 

Current:
- Stamhuis Deutschland GmbH: New business
- PUM, The Hague:
    → Belle Mariee, Santa Cruz (Bolivia): general business advice on branding, expansion, retail /wholesale
    → UNIDO, Armenia, three-year development program 
    →Nanman LLC, Yerevan, Armenia, development/wholesale

Recently:
- Lixero BV, Deurne, DACH
- Profile Tyrecenter Oss, management consultant
- MVRO BV., Geldermalsen, new business DACH
- Chainbalance BV, Breda, new business 

PUM (Den Haag): 
- M. Sisakyan LLC, Spitak (Armenia), basics BA & int. positioning, marcom, sales, setup new business
- CTA Manantiales, Carmen de Viboral (Colombia), setup new business, own sportswear label 
- MAX Group Ulaan Baatar (Mongolia), training sales staff,about working with fixed procedures / purchase planning, sourcing for new supplier, analyse data / facts / figures in order to advise the company’s board on strategic decisions, organization structures, retail / lease, marcom, loyalty programs, instore design 
- Multiforms NV., Paramaribo (Suriname), management advise retail/wholesale

Other:
- fashioncheque GmbH, Berlin (D) 
- Unitex Einkaufsverband GmbH., Neu-Ulm (D)  
- ELKA Kaufhaus GmbH, Peine (D), consultancy purchase department 
- Manou Lenz ML TV Conzept GmbH, Langenhagen (D), head of sales
- Shoeby Franchise b.v., Rosmalen (NL), roll-out franchise / wholesale DACH 
- marketing-displays GmbH (Cologne), sales Benelux
- Instituut voor Winkelanalyse, analysis 
- World Fashion Center, Amsterdam, leasing consultancy
- Chamber of Commerce A'dam, int. business consultancy
profile_positions.title: General Manager / Owner
General Manager / Owner

profile_positions.description:
Center manager, Brandboxx Hannover, Langenhagen (D), B2B fashion center.

International repositioning center after SWOT analysis, development strategy, implementation new marcom activities, rebranding. International acquisition. Improve number of tenants, supervising / motivating team, finetuning internal processes.
Resignation at own request because of starting up business as a free agent via Taurus Management.
profile_positions.title: Center Manager

profile_positions.description:
International new profile after SWOT analysis, development strategy concerning new tenants, rebranding fashion centre plus total make-over. Reduced voidness successfully (from 60% to 10% in ca 17 months). All B2B (fashion industry. Complete new marcom strategy. Finetuning internal processes and motivation staff.
Resignation at own request because of tending bankruptcy real estate holding.
profile_positions.title: General Manager fashion center 'Haus Paris'

profile_positions.description:
International launch Jaguar Women,
This project was stopped because of takeover by Vilenzo.
profile_positions.title: Sales & Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Int. high end fashion label, manufacturer of ready-to-wear collections, resposible for international wholesale / retail foreign markets, start up s-i-s, key account management and aquisition, Observation / analysis of foreign European markets. Strategic and conceptional planning of marcom activities, Supervisor local sales organizations, Budget responsible. PR / press contacts, corporate identity activities, organization fairs / events.
Resignation after being asked by a headhunter for the new postion of s&m manager at United Fashion Makers (launch Jaguar Women).
profile_positions.title: Export Manager

profile_positions.description:
Freelance ('ehrenamtlich') assignments:
Promoting Dutch export to Germany (Netherland Foreign Investment Agency), promoting contacts between Bavarian/German and Dutch industries, organization large important business platform 'Koninginnedag', executive member Deutsch-Niederländisches Geschäftsforum (network D/NL/ business), organization events Dutch community in Munich.
Move to the Netherlands.

Complete staff incl. myself got fired afterm probation period.

High end private fashion retailer, centre of Munich, general management store, buying / selling, responsible for HR, coaching/motivation team, all POS-activities.
Resignation at own request because of being sought after by Prada.

profile_positions.description:
Supervisor Customer Service Benelux (16 professionals) high-end medical products, interpreter, daily costumer contacts with Benelux, corporate newsletter, organization congresses / fairs.
Resignation at own request because of 'homesickness for the fashion branche'.

profile_positions.description:
Fashion retailchain, middle to high end, well-know small family enterprise.
Responsible for all long-term strategic planning and marcom activities, visual display, buying/selling, POS-activities, fashion consultancy (B2B) / corporate fashion, organization / presentation (fashion) events (intern / extern), styling private label collections.
Resignation at own request because of personel reasons.
profile_positions.title: Co-owner by marriage
